Module count
Package count.model

Class TreeWithRates

java.lang.Object
count.model.TreeWithRates
All Implemented Interfaces:
GLDParameters
Direct Known Subclasses:
TreeWithRates.ParameterCache
public class TreeWithRates
extends Object
implements GLDParameters
Basic class for storing rate parameters on tree edges.
Author:
Miklós Csűrös

  • Nested Class Summary

    Nested Classes 
    Modifier and Type Class Description
    class  TreeWithRates.ParameterCache
    A mirror of the embedding class that uses its own cache for getXXXParameter(int node).

      node -
      p - loss parameter
